name: بريد
body:
<form method="POST" action="http://formspree.io/niceperson_niceperson@bigfoot.com">
  <input dir="rtl" lang="ar" type="email" name="email" placeholder="أدخل إيميلك هنا">
  <textarea dir="rtl" lang="ar" name="message" placeholder="أدخل رسالتك هنا"></textarea>
  <button type="submit">أرسل</button>
</form>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
